item.title: [MAD] Entry-01 : Evil Deno Caught In Wild
item.description:
What is MAD?

MAD stands for Malware Analysis Diary. In these entries, I’ll take a look and try analyzing some interesting and challenging binaries that may include: complex infection, techniques, reverse engineering, obfuscation, and try to cover variety of samples and so on.

Context of this Entry

The context originates from MalwareHunterTeam Tweet. This introduces an executable named GoogleDriverSetup.exe, It is compiled using Rust based JavaScript runtime called Deno. Let’s get started!
